sentences.en: Also, a by - product of the corona is heat.

sentences.en: In addition, CORONA further plans diversified branding strategies regarding the ever - changing lifestyle and industrial chain.

sentences.en: The corona is a brilliant, pearly white, filmy light, about as bright as the full Moon.
